text: John, have you noticed Sarah being a bit off recently? I'm getting worried.
Hey buddy, do you think the Riverdale Gallery exhibit is worth a visit?
Sarah seems to be in her own world lately, not sure what's up. Any ideas?
John, Sarah mentioned you might go to the Riverdale Gallery. If you go, let me know how it is!
Is everything okay with Sarah? She's been acting differently and I'm not sure why.
